p: Harsini ( 194) investigated the action of A. occidentale stem bark ethanolic extract against S. aureus by analyzing Ca 2+ and K + ion leakage inside the bacterial cell. Ca 2+ leakage at 0% (control), 3, 5 and 7% concentrations varied from 2.42 to 66.73 mM, and for K + this ranged from 15.28 to 1,251 mM, destabilizing the cell.
